Reviews.Title: “Great business trip accommodation”
Reviews.Author: KOmmen
Reviews.Content: stayed hotel october 2011 pleased stay service excellent clean modern comfortable hotel serves business trip purpose mattress little firm taste sleeping despite breakfast included price delicious value price stay reasonable stay business trip mexico city

Reviews.Title: “Comfortable hotel in Mexico City downtown”
Reviews.Author: El_Josu
Reviews.Content: stayed hotel night trip mexico city located paseo de la reforma visiting el zocalo square surprised size bigger expected happened shower huge bed perfect kingsize pillows exactly spending day walking pyramids mall perfectly isolated outside noise slept baby hotels tv security box coffee machine wifi didnt suppose properly didnt breakfast poor opinion overall considering location price choice looking comfortable affordable hotel centre ciudad de mexico

Reviews.Content: hotel remarkable huge super tidy free cofee nice stuff fd houskeeping restaurant nice friendly breakfast absolutly worthy hotel placed dont mention thanks marvelous stay

Reviews.Title: “Needs serious cleaning and manteinance”

Reviews.Content: key didnt downstairs complain line key change provided key night key staff batteries everyday awful delayed time hotel smells carpets dirty looks hotel proper built pay 10 stay hotel

Reviews.Title: “Nice hotel in convenient location”
Reviews.Author: dusteater
Reviews.Content: stayed hotel business mexico city hotel nice inside fairly nice view huge shower clean internet fine decent speed network cables waiting breakfast sausage eggs coffee juice location nice mall bottom hotel alot shopping starbucks outside hotel entrance amount food options doesnt tv signal cuts alot otherwise nice hotel reasonable rate

Reviews.Title: “Stay away from this hotel if you are on a business trip”
Reviews.Author: Relax200
Reviews.Content: stayed weeks positive mention hotel staff friendly business trip internet connection regardless wifi cable advertised speed internet connection allways low pc indicated lowest level measured getting cable alternative connection days promised 10 minutes unfortunately cable connection faster able access internet breakfast buffet boring day minimalistic food offered carpet filthy stains definately select hotel business trip mexico city

Reviews.Content: stayed nights booked online view utter disappointment checked tried pass regular paid extra course usual yada yada saved trip upstairs nice apology willing wait anyway floor spacious clean perfectly amenable bath tub water pressure showers sizable hotel running little staffthere person front desk thereso person answer calls front store duties detriment manage meager power beyond front desk rush ferry getting help laundry forty minute waste time effort service hotel strange claims geared businessmen business center sad hole hardly oh free wifi hotel suffers intermittent failure useless gym sad story breakfast basic hotel specials basic cafeteria fare served cafeteria manner look forward breakfast day fairly central beside mall restaurants shopping movie theaters museo modern art short bus rides nearby chapultepec park zona rosa own fair share characters stay charms mexico city fare elsewhere
